jbt.model.task.composite
Class ModelSelector

java.lang.Object
  jbt.model.core.ModelTask
      jbt.model.task.composite.ModelComposite
          jbt.model.task.composite.ModelSelector

public class ModelSelector
extends ModelComposite

This class represents a task with one or more children, which are run sequentially.

A selector tries to run all its children sequentially. Therefore, there is an active child task. However, when the current active task fails, the selector does not fail, but goes on to the next child task, which is evaluated. A selector succeeds if one of the tasks succeeds, and fails if all the child tasks fail.

Author:
Ricardo Juan Palma Dur√°n

Constructor Detail

ModelSelector

public ModelSelector(ModelTask guard,
                     ModelTask... children)
Constructor.

Constructs a ModelSelector with some children. A ModelSelector must have at least one child.

Parameters:
guard - the guard of the ModelSelector, which may be null.
children - the list of children. Must have at least one element.
